How To Migrate To MTN Yafun Yafun

Are you an MTN subscriber or intending one who wants to enjoy plenty awoof, then MTN yafun yafun is for you.

Follow the steps below to migrate to it.

MTN Yafun Yafun is a unique tariff plan from MTN. Only new MTN subscribers have access to MTN Yafun Yafun bonuses.

How to Activate MTN YafunYafun Plan

  • Purchase a new MTN Sim Card and
  • Recharge your MTN line by dialing *311*PIN#
  • Enjoy Yafun Yafun Bonuses

Validity Period.

Note that the MTN Yafun Yafun bonus has a validity period of 7 days. After 7 days, the unused bonus will expire.

And If you recharge before the bonus expires, you will receive another compensation but all bonus received will expire separately, with the expiry dates assigned to them.

You should note that after 3 months, you will cease receiving these bonuses on your recharges and will be automatically migrated to the  MTN BetaTalk tariff plan.

How to Check Your MTN YafunYafun Bonus Balance

To check your MTN Yafun Yafun Bonus.

Just dial *310# to view all existing bonuses.

And the above is how to migrate and enjoy your MTN yafun yafun.
